actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Transportation for a grant to the State of Alabama for construction of a highway bridge across the Tombigbee River.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to Alabama for the construction of a highway bridge across the Tombigbee River at Naheola, Alabama. Authorizes appropriations for such grant.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Transportation for a grant to the State of Alabama for construction of a highway bridge across the Tombigbee River.
